body: These sturdy, weatherproof bags are draped over a saddle to add extra carrying capacity. Each side of a saddlebag can typically carry 20 pound of items that can fit in the bags. Saddlebags do not increase the amount of weight a mount can carry; they merely give riders a place to stow their equipment.
name: Saddlebags
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Equipment/Goods And Services/Mounts and Related Gear/Saddlebags
